ai-patthana14.7:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.7:3.1_0: the condition being by way of arising, and the condition.
ai-patthana14.7:4.1_0: It’s not conditioned by way of teaching, conditioned by way of teaching condition.
ai-patthana14.7:5.1_0: Two on the one object, two on the objects of meditation,
ai-patthana14.7:5.1_3: the snake having given up horns,
